meanings: Noun 주(週), 일주일(월요일~일요일 또는 일요일~토요일까지의 한 주간)

vlive.korean: 평일 중에 후반! The latter half of the week. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: The latter half of the week.

vlive.korean: 일주일 밤샐 수 있는 거 아냐? a week isn't a bid deal, right? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: a week isn't a bid deal, right?

vlive.korean: 내일부터? 지난주부터 판매를 했어요? From tomorrow? It's been selling from last week? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: From tomorrow? It's been selling from last week?

vlive.korean: 수요일 평일인데 - 그니까 교정했을 때 어땠냐고요? It's middle of the week Wednesday. - How was it when I did my braces? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🌰🌰
vlive.english: It's middle of the week Wednesday. - How was it when I did my braces?

vlive.korean: [다음 주도 기대해주세요][TO DO] 그냥 이거라도 줘야겠다 하면서... [Look forward to next week] [TO DO] They're like we have to give them this... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Look forward to next week] [TO DO] They're like we have to give them this...

examples.korean: I mow the lawn every week in summer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 여름에는 잔디를 매주 깎는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I mow the lawn every week in summer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has been harried by the press all week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 일주일 내내 언론에 시달렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has been harried by the press all week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The brochures were mailed out last week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 안내 책자들은 지난주에 발송되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The brochures were mailed out last week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The trial has been adjourned until next week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 재판은 다음주까지 휴정되었다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The trial has been adjourned until next week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The box office takings are up on last week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지난주에는 극장 표 매출액이 증가했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The box office takings are up on last week. Add to Wordbook
